function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases due to inadequate supplies during quarantine period leading to anxiety and frustration","Impact":"Increased risk of mental health issues such as anxiety, depression, and psychological distress","Mitigation":"Ensure timely and consistent distribution of basic supplies such as food, water, and clothes during quarantine","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems for efficient distribution","People":"People in quarantine, especially those with pre-existing mental health conditions","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases due to inadequate information from public health authorities","Impact":"Confusion and stress due to inappropriate guidelines and conflicting health messages, leading to ineffective pandemic control measures","Mitigation":"Provide clear and consistent guidelines and health messages, improve coordination among multiple jurisdictions and levels of government","Technologies":"Communication technologies for effective dissemination of information, coordination platforms for government agencies","People":"General public, individuals affected by quarantine and pandemic control measures","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"}]}
